comment: PROFESSOR IS SWEET BUT IS A TOUGH GRADER. SHE WILL GIVE YOU A ZERO JUST BECAUSE YOU DIDN'T DO THE WORK THE WAY SHE TEACHS SO YOU CAN'T CHEAT. LECTURE VIDEOS ARE VERY LONG. TEST TOOK UP ALOT OF TIME DUE TO HER WANTING US TO SHOW WORK ONLINE BY TYPING BASICALLY WHAT WE DID ON SCRATCH PAPER EVEN THOUGH WE HAD TO TURN IN SCRATCH PAPER??? NOT AN EASY A.

Overall, not too bad, but if you're a slow learner in math, pick someone else, but be aware that she does micrograde your work, which is only being taught by her method, so no cheating. She exempts you from the final exam if you score 90 or higher on the last unit test.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: This class would be a VERY easy, however she is a very harsh grader. Also if you're doing the homework that is slightly different from hers, she takes a lot of points off. And the tests was a lil hard and took up too much time because we had to show our work. So choose someone else if you can. Would not take her in the future.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Lecture vids are 2 hrs or more. Lots of hw, “video assignments”, quizzes, and 3 tests. She is a tough grader and if you get outside help and it's not her math then she'll give you a zero. Tests were hard to take bc of the way she wanted us to show our work online. She responds quickly but if you can find better take them, if you can't she's fine.

idk but it was an ok class for me, however If you're not great at math, don't take it online. Don't cheat on her assignment or test or make mistakes, or she's going to think you're cheating, so be careful, follow directions, and do it how she does. She uses LDBW and watches them, so no cheating. I think she's way better taking her in person tbh

Can be a harsh grader. Points off for minor mistakes (5-10 points).Tests are 2 hours, not many questions but every question has 5+ parts, lockdown with camera (she reviews them). 4+ things to do each week (quiz, hw, assignment, 1+ hour videos). Her videos were very helpful and teaches things well. Super easy class tho. If 90+ you can exempt final.

It was an ok class for me. However, she uses the lockdown browser webcam on the unit test, as she does watch them. DO NOT CHEAT ON ANYTHING. Overall, I do not recommend this class, as the instructor is very strict and is likely to assume you are cheating; therefore, be cautious when completing assignments, tests, and other coursework. Have fun..

Idk if I liked her or not. She would have us watch these 2 hr lecture videos so boring. Then do a HW on ALEKS and an assignment that went with the video. We also had weekly quiz, and 3 tests plus a midterm and final. She WILL watch the lockdown video so no cheating. She will grade you on the avg of everything. So getting bad grades can hurt you.

I wanted to withdraw so bad, but I had a hard time taking this professor. She likes to assume students who didn't watch the lecture videos and gives us a low score on hw if it's set up differently as if the tutor and YouTube weren't available for help if needed to be taught in an easy method.Will not recommend her to anyone please don't take her.

Yall just please don't take this professor. I don't know if she is new to online but she is harsh at the material. Don't recommend her. She gave me a 0 on her unit because she did not see me put in my calculations to get the answers to the questions on the webcam lockdown. She likes to assume things. DO NOT TAKE HER!!

I just want to say this is just not it for statistics. She gives you a low score if the video assignments are not the same setup as she did in the lecture videos. The unit tests are two hours long. Are you kidding me???? 16-21 questions and two hours is beyond (diabolical) 2 me, especially in the courses of math. NEVER WILL I TAKE HER AGAIN.

do not let these reviews fool you !! do not take her online !!! there are two homework assignments and a quiz or test all due every Friday . She gives videos that you have to watch that are both 1-2 hours long and if you don't do homework exactly like she does in the videos you will get points off . You can tell she prefers teaching in person .
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Would be an easy class except she seems new to teaching online classes. Gives you 0's on assignments if you do the work slightly different than her (2 hour long) videos. Not many grades so there's little opportunities to get your grade back up if you do receive a 0. I've heard she's better in-person so keep that in mind when taking this course!

The exams are on Aleks, it is webcam she does look at the webcam afterwards and there is 20 questions and you have 2 hours to complete the test.She gives 1 graded homework sheet and if the homework is wrong she Assumes you didn't watch the 2 hour lecture videos which is 10% each and you will receive a 0. She likes giving out ZEROS.

Amazing Stats professor! All lectures were posted with guided notes alongside them, homework was light and there were 3 lockdown tests but you could have a sheet of paper with handwritten notes for each one! If you had above a 90 after the finals unit test you could exempt the cumulative final and finish the class early! Would 100% take again
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: There is no better stats teacher than Ms.Kolb. The first time I took this class at gsu I got an 68, but Ms.Kolb's thorough teaching allowed me to finish with a 107. If you're looking to be challenged I would not look here, but if you need to pass stats, she's your best bet. Attendance is not mandatory, but she gives bonus points for < 2 absences.

Loved this class! She gives you fill-in-the-blank notes for you to answer during the lecture. She connects each lesson with another and is super helpful and approachable. Homework is easy if you understand the topics. Attendance isn't mandatory but recommended! She also loves students who participate and answer her questions or talk to her :D

One of the best Stats professors! She provides fill-in notes (that can be used for quizzes) and provides practice problems. Aleks homework was assigned, but it is easy 100 if you use the notes. 3 unit tests, FCAR at the end of the semester. If you have a 90 or more, you can exempt the final. AMAZING TEACHER!! TAKE HER IF YOU CAN!

SHE IS AMAZING!!!! TAKE HER!!!! ms.Kolb is the best professor at ksu. She is actually the most genuine and caring professor ive had. she gives clear review on what will be on the test and lets you use a note card. she gives fill in the blank notes which are so helpful. seriously if you want to pass stat take ms.Kolb.
I loved her. She was an amazing teacher and really care for her students. I highly recommend you take her for stats.

Ms. Kolb is the best option for STAT1401. Her assignments are super clear and easy to follow. She's a super nice lady & helpful during her office hours if you didn't get something during a lecture. She assigns ALEKS for each chapter which is essentially an easy 100 in the gradebook if you use her notes from lecture to complete it. 10/10 recommend.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Ms. Kolb is an amazing teacher. I was apprehensive to take STATs, but she has great lectures, keeps an easy-going classroom environment, and the amount course work was easily manageable. She has printable fill in the blank notes available before class, and she post completed notes after class is over so if you miss a class, you won't fall behind.

I seriously cannot say enough nice things about this Professor. Please take her you will not regret it! I was terrible at math before her class and she made me not want to miss a single class. Take her!!

It's STATS, so it's not going to be easy, but she makes it easier to handle and understand. Attendance not mandatory, but it'll bump your grade up attending. She uses ALEKS, but only grades the homework and quizzes she gives. 8 HW's, 3 Tests, 6 quizzes including the FCAR, and she drops the lowest HW and quiz grade. TAKE HER IF YOU WANT TO PASS!!!

She is super sweet and caring! Weekly homework, a few quizzes (most of them were online/taken at home), and 3 tests + final if applicable (If you have an A you'll exempt it). Each test you were allowed a notecard to use, the test is pretty much exactly like the study guide. Extra credit is offered on all 3 tests. She drops 1 quiz and 1 homework.

Such a loving woman, and a very good stats teacher. Quizzes and tests are allowed cheat notecards and it's all spot on to her lectures. Homework every week, but very easy to do. I enjoyed her so much as a person because she explains things so well and cares so much about your success. Such an easy A.
I love Mrs. Kolb and everything that she teaches is so easy but you have to pay attention. It's a must that you have to pay attention.

She is the sweetest teacher I have ever had. TAKE HER!! She makes the course very easy to understand and she is so understanding. she walks through everything and really cares about her students learning. She gives an extra point overall to people who miss < 2 classes and drops your lowest quiz grade. I love her so much take her fr

please take her. she makes stat simple and is an amazing teacher overall. she cares about you and wants you to do well. she also understands that you have other priorities/classes which is super beneficial

She is the kindest woman on this planet , if you work with her she is willing to work with you. She has motivated me to be and do better for myself and for her class, she explains content very well and provides all the time and resources needed to ensure we do well in her class. She is an absolute doll, I would take her class again in a heart beat
Shes one of the nicest professors & she explains everything very well. She lets you use a notecard for the tests & all quizzes are open note.

She was an amazing teacher! Attendance is not mandatory but it is recorded, if you have under 3 unexcused absences she'll add extra points to your final grade. She allows students to fill out a notecard to use for tests, and she has a weekly assignment on ALEKS. She is ALWAYS wiling to help and truly wants her students to pass. Take her if you can!

Kolb gives guided notes you fill out during class and typically only assigns homework and a quiz per unit. She allows you to use a flashcard of "cheat" notes for the exams. You have to try to fail. TAKE HER. She's super friendly.

This is the first math class that I have ever enjoyed! If you are willing to show up to class then you will get an A. She explains exactly what will be on tests/quizzes on review day and allows students to have cheat sheets. She is readily available outside of class and is willing to help students. She explains the material clearly and practically!

Honestly the best math teacher I've had since high school. She's available through email fairly late at night and the day of a test before you take it. She's easily the nicest professor and really wants everyone to do well. Had her for her 1st year teaching and loved her. Didn't take the final because I had an A in the class but her tests are great
Professor Kolb is the sweetest lady you will ever meet! She actually cares about her students and wants them to pass! Show up and do the homework and you will be fine

This did not start as an online class but was transitioned due to COVID-19. Professor Kolb is amazing and you would have to try hard to not make an A in this class. You are allowed to use a note card as reference for all quizzes and tests. You don't have to study hard, or attend class. I never went but made detailed note cards and got an easy A!

Take Prof Kolb if you can get her! She is by far the best prof I have ever had. She's super caring and will help you through any problems or questions you have. Her lectures are crystal clear, so as long as you follow with the notes, you will get an A. She really does just want the best for her students. Highly recommend!!

literally one of the nicest profs ive had this semester. shes a grad student and she understands the college struggle so she makes class as easy as possible! 7 quizzes, 3 tests, final (u can opt out if u have an A), and online hw. if u struggle w math, take her!!! she explains so clearly n the class itself is very easy. highly recommend!
